actions.text: Amendment SA 3604 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3604 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 53. Record Vote Number: 170.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3604 made in Senate.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3604.
Amendment SA 3604 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S8996-9002, S9003; text: CR S8996) To increase the among provided for first responder programs, and to provide offsets.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3604 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 53. Record Vote Number: 170.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3604 proposed by Senator Dodd.

purpose: To increase the among provided for first responder programs, and to provide offsets.
